alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 7:24PM CST until February 08 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 724 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Big Bend, or 8 miles northeast of Simmesport, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Black Hawk around 735 PM CST. Slocum around 740 PM CST. Sibley around 755 PM CST. Kingston around 800 PM CST. Cranfield around 810 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
